## Environment

Copy in the results of the following commands, entered into the console, below

-   Node version: [`$ node -v`]
-   Node version (nvm): [`$ nvm run node -v`]
-   npm version: [`$ npm -v`]
-   b-ber version: [`$ bber --version`]
-   Project config: [`$ cat ./config.yml`]
